name: Dig Away! - Idle Mining Game
description:
Dig Away! - Idle Mining Game is a brand new idle/clicker -game with retro style graphics and unique gameplay mechanisms.

PC version is missing some of the features compared to Android version (as of yet).

I've originally designed this on Android which can be download on:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RuotoGames.DigAwayIdleMiningGa...

(Android version is currently the only version with all of the features, including leaderboards, full tech tree etc..)

Some of the main features on PC-version:

- Crafting
- Research
- Fast-paced gameplay
- Lots of unlockable miners and drills

Please leave a feedback :)
